comments:
The error below was found on M8 + patches, and causes a failure publishing to a
server. I've checked the code, and it looks like the same code is still there;
please return if this has already been fixed.

java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
	at java.util.AbstractList.add(AbstractList.java:164)

This is fixed in the WTP 1111 M9 integration driver.
